changeSet.createView: SELECT p.id, p.about, p.birth_date, (date_part('year'::text, ('now'::text)::date) - date_part('year'::text, (p.birth_date)::date)) AS age, p.confirmation_code, p.e_mail, p.first_name, p.is_approved, p.is_blocked, p.last_name, p.last_online_time, p.messages_permission, p.password, p.phone, p.photo, p.reg_date, p.role, p.country_id, c.name AS country_name, p.town_id, t.name AS town_name FROM ((person p LEFT JOIN country c ON ((p.country_id = c.id))) LEFT JOIN town t ON ((p.town_id = t.id))) WHERE ((p.is_blocked = false) AND (p.is_approved = true));
